Line 26: Line 26:
== Criticism of Wikipedia ==
== Criticism of Wikipedia ==
â
In 2006, Carl Hewitt was banned from editing those parts of [[Wikipedia]] that pertain to himself and his work. He has since been highly critical of Wikipedia editing policies and perceived censorship; in particular, he claims that the combined effect of the [[Wikipedia:Neutral_point_of_view|Neutral Point of View]], [[Wikipedia:No_original_research|No Original Research]], [[Wikipedia:Conflict_of_interest|Conflict of Interest]] and [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:OUTING#Posting_of_personal_information No outing the real names of administrators] policies, as currently practiced by Wikipedia, are in conflict with normal academic practice and with expert academic participation. <ref>{{cite web|author = Carl Hewitt |title= Corruption of Wikipedia|url=http://knol.google.com/k/carl-hewitt-httpcarlhewittinfo/corruption-of-wikipedia/pcxtp4rx7g1t/5?domain=knol.google.com&locale=en#|year = 2008|accessdate = 2009-01-04}}</ref> He has requested that this biography article be removed [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Talk%3ACarl_Hewitt&diff=188647723&oldid=187414509].
+
In 2006, Carl Hewitt was banned from editing those parts of [[Wikipedia]] that pertain to himself and his work. He has since been highly critical of Wikipedia editing policies and perceived censorship; in particular, he claims that the combined effect of the [[Wikipedia:Neutral_point_of_view|Neutral Point of View]], [[Wikipedia:No_original_research|No Original Research]], [[Wikipedia:Conflict_of_interest|Conflict of Interest]] and [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:OUTING#Posting_of_personal_information No outing the real names of administrators] policies, as currently practiced by Wikipedia, are in conflict with normal academic practice and with expert academic participation. <ref>{{cite web|author = Carl Hewitt |title= Corruption of Wikipedia|url=http://knol.google.com/k/carl-hewitt-httpcarlhewittinfo/corruption-of-wikipedia/pcxtp4rx7g1t/5?domain=knol.google.com&locale=en#|year = 2008|accessdate = 2009-01-04}}</ref> He has requested that his biography article be removed from wikipedia [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Talk%3ACarl_Hewitt&diff=188647723&oldid=187414509].
